title: Hema Malini
summary: Hema Malini (born 16 October 1948) is an Indian actress, dancer, writer, director, producer, and politician.[4] She is primarily known for her work in Hindi films. Malini made her acting debut in 1963 with the Tamil film Idhu Sathiyam.[5] Malini first acted in a lead role in Sapno Ka Saudagar (1968), and went on to feature in numerous Hindi films, frequently opposite Dharmendra, whom she married in 1980.[6] Malini was initially promoted as the "Dream Girl", and in 1977 starred in a film of the same name.[6] Known for starring in both comic and dramatic roles, she was among the most successful leading actresses of mainstream Hindi cinema.[7][8][9][10]
